adjectives.description: ago (comparative more ago, superlative most ago)

entries.meaning: (archaic or dialectal) Gone; gone by; gone away; passed; passed away.
(archaic or dialectal) Nearly gone; dead (used in Devonshire at the turn of the 19th century)
examples: Woe the day- she is agone!

adverbs.description: ago (comparative more ago, superlative most ago)

examples: When they first met in 2000, my dad told my mom how he had gotten the money. The story begins 20 years ago.
